section.title: profile
section.para: profile command interacts with javax.slee.management:name=ProfileProvisioning MBean. It is standard JSLEE MBean. This command allows to perform basic management operations on profile tables and profiles, like creation and removal . It supports following operations:

section.title: list
section.para: list operation lists information based on passed options. It does not support argument. One of following options must be present:

listitem.para: instructs operation to list table names present in container. It supports optional argument. If ProfileSpecificationID is present as argument, table names are listed only for that specification:

example.title: List table names for specific Profile Specification

listitem.para: instructs operation to list profile IDs. It requires ProfileTable name as argument.

section.title: create
section.para: create operation creates resource in container. Based on passed option it creates profile table or profile in table. It does not support argument, following options are supported:

listitem.para: specifies profile name. It is used in conjunction with --table-name, it excludes --profile-spec. Requires profile name as argument.
specifies table name. Requires table name as argument.
specifies profile specification. It is used in conjunction with --table-name, it excludes --profile-name. Requires ProfielSpecificationID as argument.

section.title: remove
section.para: remove operation removes component based no options. It does not support argument. It supports following options:

listitem.para: specifies table name for operation. Requires table name as argument.
specifies profile name for operation. Requires profile name as argument.

section.title: rename
section.para: rename operation changes name of profile table, effectively moving profiles to new table in the process. It does not support argument. It supports following options:

listitem.para: specifies current(old) name of profile table. Requires profile table name as argument.
specifies new name for profile table. Requires profile table name as argument.

section.title: get
section.para: get operation queries container for certain information. Type of retrieved information depends on sub-options. It does not support argument. Following options are supported:

listitem.para: retrieves profile ProfileSpecificationID for certain table. Requires profile table name as argument.
